question: Which among the following nations native and endemic species is "Giant Sable Antelope"?
explanation: Giant Sable Antelope is the national symbol of Angola. It is native and endemic to the regions of Angola. Initially, it was thought the species got extinct due to the Angolan Civil War but in 2004, certain wildlife photographers sighted a herd of antelopes in the Angolan forests. It is a critically endangered animal according to the IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
